root.name: Revolution
root.description: Development and CancellationRevolution began development at THQ's Concrete Games in late 2005. While in development, Revolution gained complete style changes and many things were moved around in production. In January 2008, along with announcing that the PlayStation 3 version of Frontlines: Fuel of War had been cancelled, THQ also announced that they are shutting down Concrete Games. The studio shutdown also cancelled the still unannounced Revolution. After that, the studio produced a few assets for Saints Row 2 and closed down.
